paper.title: Index Tracking Method Based on the Neural Networks and Its Empirical Study
paper.abstract: In this paper, the neural network is used to improve the structure of assets allocation of index tracking portfolio. The empirical results shows that the performance of index tracking based on the neural networks is better than that of other methods mentioned in the literatures. The index tracking approach based on neural networks is a good method for index tracking problem.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是使用神经网络优化指数跟踪投资组合的资产配置结构，这直接属于投资组合管理的范畴。论文的研究目标和实证结果均围绕指数跟踪问题展开，而未涉及衍生品定价或金融风险管理。
